categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: A male Human Sith apprentice served Lord Vivicar during the Cold War. The Sith Apprentice assisted Vivicar in the Sith Lord's campaign to destroy the Jedi Order with the Dark Plague. The apprentice was defeated on Coruscant by the Barsen'thor of the Jedi Order.
